Reviews.Title: Great pics and video, once you figure out complex instructions.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Likes electronics."
Reviews.Content: Great photos, but very complex to operate.  Still have not found out how to FTP pictures.  Another D-Link IP cam is very easy to use... but not this one.  Use this only if you're happy with the app for iPhone or Android... it works great.

Reviews.Title: No help from dlink
Reviews.Author: czk
Reviews.Content: I downloaded a copy of the complete manual from dlink's website. The instructions for setting up alerts are completely inadequate. At one point they completely cop out by saying if you don't know how to do this consult your system administrator. At home I am my system administrator.I emailed customer service asking for some help. Nothing since the automated response.I bought this camera to record and alert on motion detect. I am sure the camera can do it, but you'll get no help from dlink.

Reviews.Title: I think that for the price this camera is not a good deal
Reviews.Author: Nisim Heletz
Reviews.Content: I wonder why I can a sophisticated android tablet or phone for $200 and this little camera does very little for the same price?Well, it was very easy to configure and it works OK sending 720p video plus night vision in black and white.This one does not have rotating head for example and only 720p.Also I was trying to aim it down and the camera head bumps against the stand so I can't really get a sharp angle pointing down.Bottom line, I just don't think it was good value and maybe there is a better camera at a better value.

Reviews.Title: dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Gin
Reviews.Content: This product is a nightmare to set up. Need specific routers, not that compatible with apple products. Customer support is bad and their websites are difficult to navigate. I rarely write reviews but this was so frustrating i had to.

ProductInfo.Features:
Outdoor-ready - rugged weatherproof casing (IP65 rated)
HD 720p - view more details with HD (1MP) image quality
Local Video Recording - microSD card slot for recording video on camera
Enhanced Motion Detection - PIR sensor for enhanced detection & alerting
Night Vision - view up to 15 feet in total darkness
H.264 Video Compression - efficient use of network bandwidth & smaller file size
Remote Viewing - free remote live video viewing on mobile devices and web browsers with mydlink
Wireless / Ethernet - Secure connection for flexible placement
ProductInfo.Name: D-Link Wireless HD Day/Night Outdoor Network Surveillance Camera with mydlink-Enabled (DCS-2332L)
